header.name: Grzegorz Kozub
header.title: Senior Software Engineer
header.headline: Arch, Dev and Ops by passion for technology. Always learning, keen on Microservices Architecture and Domain-Driven Design, aims to become a tech full-stack and a programming polyglot. Tech Lead and Team Lead by passion for people. Encourages teams to embrace the DevOps culture and work together according to Lean Principles.
